Title: Running Javascript at the Edge
Abstract: Edge runtimes were all the rage at the beginning of the 2020s. Companies like Vercel and Cloudflare were heavily pushing the idea that pushing your website and JS applications to the edge will solve many performance issues and deliver industry-leading speeds. Let's separate fact and fiction.

Title: Agentic Search with JavaScript: Multi-Agent Intelligence for Next-Gen Insights
Abstract: See how JavaScript powers the future of search: agentic systems that decompose queries, orchestrate AI agents, and deliver decision-ready insights. Move beyond retrieval to real intelligence with multi-agent architectures that scale with modern apps and enterprise data.

Title: Let Your Browser Take a Breather with a Scheduler.yield().
Abstract: Modern web applications often overload the browser’s main thread, causing sluggish interfaces and poor responsiveness. This talk explores how JavaScript’s single-threaded execution model contributes to that problem, and how the new `scheduler.yield()` API offers a clean, effective way to give control back to the browser without breaking your code flow. We’ll walk through the limitations of traditional approaches, introduce task prioritization with `scheduler.yield()`, and show practical examples of how to make apps feel faster and more responsive. By the end, you’ll know how to let your browser take a breather, and your users will feel the difference.

Title: Generative AI for Claims and Fraud: Reshaping Healthcare Insurance Workflows
Abstract: Unlock the power of Generative AI to revolutionize healthcare claims and fraud detection. Discover how a multi-layered AI architecture boosts speed, accuracy, and fraud prevention while tackling real-world challenges in compliance, scalability, and intelligent automation.

Title: Introduction to ARIA: A Developer's Guide
Abstract: ARIA (Accessible Rich Internet Applications) is a set of attributes that makes web content more accessible for people with disabilities, but it can be confusing for developers. This session will simplify ARIA, showing how to use it effectively to make web applications more inclusive for everyone.

Title: Level Up: Why TypeScript/JavaScript for game development?
Abstract: Discover how TypeScript and JavaScript empower web developers to create modern games, and why now is the best time! Learn about tools, workflows, and real-world examples that make these languages ideal for building cross-platform interactive experiences on the web and mobile apps!

Title: JavaScript Meets AI: Building Smarter, Faster, and Scalable Supply Chains
Abstract: Learn how JavaScript-powered AI solutions are transforming supply chains with real-time data, predictive analytics, and automation. Discover a proven framework that boosts ROI, streamlines operations, and future-proofs logistics using modern JS, AI, and cloud-native tools.

Title: A/B Testing & Experimentation: Launching a Data Science Career with Impact
Abstract: Unlock the secrets to a thriving data science career through A/B testing! Learn how to design impactful experiments, showcase real-world value, and stand out with in-demand skills that drive product decisions. Perfect for devs and data-driven thinkers!

Title: The 2025 State of JavaScript Testing
Abstract: This talk will go over what changed it the past decade regarding testing Web applications. We will focus on practices, patterns, and library changes and learn what the future holds for us around test runners, testing libraries, mocking, production practices, and AI-based tools.

Title: Code smarter, not harder: How AI Coding Tools Boost Your Productivity
Abstract: Software development is about efficiency and creativity. In Code smarter, not harder: How AI Coding Tools Boost Your Productivity, I explore how tools like GitHub Copilot and Cursor transform workflows, automate tasks, and let you focus on delivering smarter solutions and exceptional code.

Title: Building AI Agents in JavaScript
Abstract: Discover how JavaScript developers can harness the power of AI to build intelligent agents that automate workflows, enhance productivity, and solve real-world challenges—all without stepping outside the tools and languages you already know.

Title: API Integration with JavaScript: Scalable, Secure, and Future-Ready Systems
Abstract: APIs power the modern web and JavaScript leads the way. Join this session to master REST, GraphQL, and event-driven integration. Learn proven patterns for scalability, security, and speed that will transform how you design future-ready applications.

Title: Revolutionizing JavaScript Performance: How Intelligent Optimization Delivers 2.29X Throughput Gains in Modern Web Applications
Abstract: Discover how intelligent optimization algorithms are revolutionizing JavaScript performance! Learn cutting-edge techniques that transform Node.js backends and React frontends, delivering massive throughput gains and faster user experiences through real-world case studies.

Title: Future-Proofing Fintech: Scalable JavaScript Architectures for Secure, Real-Time Financial Integration
Abstract: Build secure, scalable fintech apps using modern JavaScript! Learn how React, Node.js, APIs, and microservices integrate with banking platforms for real-time performance, security, and compliance in high-volume financial environments.

Title: Scaling Test Automation with Testcontainers: A Deep Dive into Containerized Testing Environments
Abstract: As modern JS applications grow in complexity, the need for robust and efficient testing environments has never been greater. In this session, we'll explore Testcontainers that simplifies the setup of Docker-based test environments, enabling developers to test their code with real dependencies .

Title: Solving Real-World Data Fetching Challenges with Next.js and TanStack Query
Abstract: When our payments platform dashboard began buckling under complex transaction data requirements, we faced a critical challenge: how do we optimize the frontend while being completely unable to modify the backend APIs?

Title: Accessible JavaScript: it's easier than you think!
Abstract: Twenty percent of the population has a disability: that means your users! It's easy enough to make your forms and JavaScript accessible, if you know how. Gian Wild gives concrete code examples and explains the three types of JavaScript functionality and the ten JavaScript and form principles.

Title: Transforming Knowledge Systems with Embedded Analytics and JavaScript Insights
Abstract: Turn static knowledge systems into dynamic, data-driven ecosystems! Learn how JavaScript-powered analytics slashed retrieval time, boosted self-service by 22 points, and saved $3.7M annually real-world lessons from a global transformation you can replicate.

Title: AI as Your Agile Copilot: Predictable, Risk-Aware, and Human-Centric JavaScript Delivery at Scale.
Abstract: Discover how AI-driven Agile can improve JavaScript delivery predictability, reduce sprint failures, and uncover risks before they hit production while keeping your team’s creativity, trust, and collaboration front and center.

Title: Agentic AI for Autonomous Micro-Frontend User Interfaces and Microservices Evolution in Cloud Platforms
Abstract: Cloud-native org. rely on microservices for backend modularity and micro-frontends for scalable user interface delivery. Yet, real-world systems still struggle to evolve. I will talk on a unified Agentic AI framework that autonomously coordinates the co-evolution of micro-frontend UIs using ReactJS.

Title: Scaling Reinforcement Learning: From Human Feedback to Distributed Intelligence.
Abstract: Discover how Reinforcement Learning is powering the next wave of AI from aligning large language models like ChatGPT to scaling decision-making across fleets of autonomous agents. Learn practical strategies for building RL systems that adapt, cooperate, and scale in the real world.

Title: JavaScript AI Integration: Transforming Healthcare Operations with Measurable Gains
Abstract: Discover how JavaScript developers are revolutionizing healthcare with AI-powered solutions. See real implementations using React, Node.js, and ML libraries that streamline operations and save lives. Practical code, proven patterns, measurable impact.

Title: Real-Time Data Systems: Engineering for Speed, Scale, and Resilience
Abstract: Learn how real-time data powers fraud detection, personalization, and instant insights! This talk dives into the tools, architectures, and battle-tested strategies behind high-speed, scalable systems. If you care about performance, this is where speed meets engineering mastery.

Title: JavaScript Micro Frontends: Fast-Track AI Integration for Modern Web Apps
Abstract: Stop letting monolithic JavaScript apps slow down your AI innovation! Learn how micro frontends with Module Federation unlock lightning-fast AI feature deployment. Real strategies, proven patterns, live demos. Transform your React/Vue/Angular apps into AI-powered experiences users love.

JobTitle1: Assistant Vice President Systems, Investor Services Technology
Title: Securing AI in Finance: Navigating Risks in the Age of Intelligent Automation
Abstract: Discover how AI is transforming finance and why it’s also creating new security risks. Learn real-world attack examples and actionable strategies to protect financial AI systems before the algorithms we trust become tools for attackers. Secure the future of AI-driven finance!

Title: AI-Ready EDI 837 Validation: Automating Claims with Modular JS Frameworks
Abstract: Discover how modern JavaScript frameworks are revolutionizing healthcare claims! Learn to automate EDI 837 validation, boost accuracy, and build AI-ready systems that cut costs, reduce errors, and future-proof revenue ops—all in one powerful session.

Title: JavaScript AI Framework: 40% Faster Enterprise SAP Integration Architecture
Abstract: Learn how JavaScript AI frameworks revolutionized enterprise SAP integration, achieving 40% faster M&A timelines through Node.js microservices, TensorFlow.js ML models, and real-time React dashboards—proving web tech drives enterprise transformation.

Title: Predictive JavaScript Monitoring: AI-Driven Observability for Node.js & React
Abstract: Drowning in JavaScript API chaos? Learn how top teams transformed 40-60 scattered Node.js services into unified ecosystems that cut development time by 45% and unlock new revenue streams. Get proven patterns for Express.js gateways, TypeScript SDKs, and React integration that scale!

JobTitle1: Finance Systems and Reporting Senior Manager
Title: Modernizing Finance with Cloud-Native and JavaScript-Driven Architectures
Abstract: Discover how cloud-native and JavaScript-powered architectures are transforming finance. Learn how to cut costs, unlock real-time insights, and automate manual processes turning finance into a strategic driver of agility and growth.

Title: One API to Rule Them All: Building Cross-Platform Apps with JavaScript That Just Work Everywhere
Abstract: Learn how to architect JavaScript apps that run seamlessly across web, iOS, Android, and even smart devices—without rewriting your core logic. I’ll share real-world lessons from Apple, Amazon, and Meta on API design, testing, and delivering flawless cross-platform experiences.

Title: JavaScript Meets the Wire: How SerDes Fuels Real-Time AI in the Browser
Abstract: Ever wonder what powers your AI-enhanced JavaScript app behind the scenes? Learn how SerDes architectures yes, hardware! shape latency, token flow, and real-time AI responsiveness for next-gen JS experiences.

Title: Cloud Telematics for Fleet Management: Efficiency, Sustainability, and Insights
Abstract: Discover how cloud-based telematics is transforming fleet management with real-time data, AI-powered insights, and IoT connectivity. Learn how to cut costs, boost efficiency, and reduce emissions while preparing for the next wave of connected, intelligent, and sustainable transportation.

Title: Scaling Trust: VM Security with Confidential Computing and Zero Trust Architecture
Abstract: Traditional VM security is outdated. Discover how Confidential Computing, Trusted Launch, and Zero Trust reshape cloud security—protecting data even from the cloud itself. Learn how to secure workloads at scale and build trust into every layer.

JobTitle1: Technical Program Manager, Engineering Manager, Senior Member Engineering Staff
Title: AI-Driven Rate Limiting for Scalable, Secure, and Cost-Efficient APIs
Abstract: Discover how AI can revolutionize API protection! Learn to build intelligent, adaptive rate-limiting systems that cut false positives, block attacks with 96.8% accuracy, and reduce cloud costs by 27%. A must-see session for security and DevOps teams building scalable, resilient APIs.

Title: Node.js + Apache Kafka: Scaling JavaScript Apps to 100K+ Messages Per Second
Abstract: Transform your Node.js apps into streaming powerhouses! Learn battle-tested patterns scaling JavaScript applications to 100K+ messages/second—400% performance gains. Real cases: fintech APIs at 5M transactions/second with sub-50ms latency. Production-ready techniques you'll implement immediately!

JobTitle1: Senior API and DevX Content Writer
Title: Making Docs and AI Work Together: Improving Context, Accuracy, and Agentic Coding in the IDE
Abstract: AI can speed up the workflow, but without the right context, it can just as easily slow it down. This session explores how to balance AI assistance with documentation to maintain accuracy and control inside the IDE. Learn how modern APIs like Cloudinary, Auth0, and Firebase can work hand in hand with AI tools to generate cleaner code, automate tasks safely, and accelerate development without guesswork.

Title: AI-Driven Quality Gates: Smarter JavaScript CI/CD with Machine Learning
Abstract: Learn how AI transforms JavaScript CI/CD pipelines by creating smart quality gates that analyze code patterns, predict failures, and reduce production incidents—practical ML integration for modern JS teams

Title: Securing JavaScript: A Framework for Frontend & Node.js Vulnerability Management
Abstract: JavaScript applications face evolving security threats spanning NPM dependencies to DOM-based attacks. Discover a comprehensive vulnerability management framework to secure your full-stack JS projects with automated scanning, risk assessment, and proven patterns.

Title: Cross-Cloud Campaign Analytics Meets JavaScript: Building Scalable Frontends for Big Data Insights
Abstract: Explore how JavaScript and big data come together to build responsive, cloud-native analytics dashboards. From API orchestration to sleek React interfaces, learn how we turned backend complexity into front-end clarity for campaign intelligence.

Title: Building the Future: Microservices, Edge & Cloud Innovation at Scale
Abstract: Unlock the power of JavaScript in next-gen cloud ecosystems! Explore how microservices, edge, serverless, and quantum tech are reshaping app architecture. Packed with real-world data, this talk delivers practical strategies for scalable, future-ready systems.

Title: Client-Side NLP: JavaScript Text Analytics for User Behavior Intelligence
Abstract: Your users are talking - are you listening? Discover how to extract powerful insights from text using JavaScript NLP libraries. Process forms, chats, and comments directly in the browser. Uncover hidden user segments and predict behavior using Natural.js and TensorFlow.js - no backend required!

Title: Building Real-Time Feature Pipelines: JavaScript's Role in Modern Data-Driven Applications
Abstract: Unlock JavaScript's AI superpowers! Build intelligent web apps that adapt in real-time. Learn to create scalable feature pipelines, integrate ML inference, and deliver personalized experiences. From Node.js to browser AI, transform how users interact with your applications

Title: Privacy by Design for JavaScript Data Systems: Building Secure and Compliant Architectures
Abstract: Learn how to embed Privacy by Design into JavaScript data systems! Discover practical techniques differential privacy, anonymization, encryption to build secure, scalable, regulation-ready platforms that protect users while enabling powerful analytics and real-world innovation.
